segments.text: I can’t help but feel a twinge of irritation watching the woman lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just drying a plate, completely unaware of the growing chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the sound of splashing water would at least give her a hint.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids seem to be gleefully unaware of the risk they're taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy, who seems like he could tip at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart racing as he reaches for those cookies like it's a prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the girl is waiting with her hand out, so trusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a playful moment, but there’s an undercurrent of danger that’s impossible to ignore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the outside world and this kitchen feels stark and jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The flowers in the garden are so vibrant, unlike the mess that’s unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Will anyone notice before it’s too late?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a snapshot of childhood innocence, yet it feels fractured by neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and bring balance back to this room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Instead, I stand by, an unseen witness to this unfolding chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake the feeling that something’s about to go horribly wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
